actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend certain laws relating to livestock trespass on Indian lands.

summary.text: Forbids the unauthorized grazing of any livestock upon the restricted land of any Indian or Indian tribe. Establishes a civil penalty of 10 times the fair market daily value of grazing by such livestock for owners of livestock who intentionally graze upon such land. Provides for impoundment by the Secretary of the Interior of livestock found to be trespassing.

titles.title: A bill to amend certain laws relating to livestock trespass on Indian lands.
